mapper.insert: insert into cart (id, user_id, product_id, quantity) values ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity} )
mapper.select: select s.id as storeId, s.name as storeBrandName, p.id as productId, p.name as productName, c.quantity as productQuantity, p.price as productPrice, p.discount_price as productDiscountPrice, p.thumbnail_image_url as productImageUrl, p.thumbnail_image_alt as productImageAlt from cart c join product p on c.product_id = p.id join store s on p.store_id = s.id where c.user_id = #{userId};

select p.id as productId, p.name as productName, c.quantity as productQuantity, p.price as productPrice, p.discount_price as productDiscountPrice, p.thumbnail_image_url as productImageUrl, p.thumbnail_image_alt as productImageAlt from cart c join product p on c.product_id = p.id where c.user_id = #{userId};
select count(*) from cart where user_id=#{userId} and product_id=#{productId}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where id=#{cartItemId} and user_id=#{userId}
